summary: Jai Vardhan is influenced by an overambitious man. He is unable to differentiate the good from the bad and is carried over into a world full of women and wealth.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Shahid Kapoor|Bipasha Basu|Amrita Rao|Javed Sheikh|John Abraham|Ash Chandler|Manoj Joshi|Ahmed Khan|Akhil Mishra|Akhilendra Mishra|Farha Naaz|Nishad Raj Rana|Sunil Rege|Sushant Singh|Jaywant Wadkar|Raj Zutshi
title: Shikhar
